# Schwarze Kulmke

| progression = Verlorene Kulmke→ Kleine Kulmke→ Große Kulmke→

| subdivision_name1 = Germany
| subdivision_type2 = States
| subdivision_name2 = Lower Saxony

Schwarze Kulmke is a small river of Lower Saxony, Germany. It flows into the Verlorene Kulmke near Herzberg am Harz.
See also
*List of rivers of Lower Saxony
